repos.Samuelxiaozhuofeng/orca-srs-plugin: An SRS (Spaced Repetition System) plugin for Orca Note.
repos.sethyuan/orca-random-walk: A plugin to help you recap/review notes (random-walk review).
repos.sethyuan/orca-simple-task: A plugin that helps you quickly create tasks using Orca Note's tag system.
repos.SaXz2/orca-snippets-plugin: JS and CSS code snippets management plugin.
repos.SaXz2/orca-today-plugins: Automatically pins notes with the Today tag to the top of the current day's journal reference list.
repos.SaXz2/orca-EasyMotion-plugin: Vim-like quick cursor jump navigation plugin with support for Chinese, Pinyin, and English mixed search.
repos.sethyuan/orca-plugin-linker: Manages large assets outside Orca Note by creating virtual paths to reference them.
repos.SaXz2/orca-page-display-plugins: Page space display plugin that provides intuitive page navigation and space management features.
repos.sethyuan/orca-plugin-hidden-text: Provides the ability to hide selected text (for folding/obscuring content).
repos.sethyuan/orca-plugin-share-card: Exports notes as cards (images) for sharing on mobile devices.
repos.Samuelxiaozhuofeng/AI-orca-plugin: AI chat plugin integration for Orca Note.
repos.sethyuan/orca-dinox-sync: Syncs Dinox notes into Orca Note (sync into journals).
repos.sethyuan/orca-flomo-sync: Syncs Flomo notes into Orca Note (sync into journals).
repos.SaXz2/orca-video-info-extract-plugin: Automatically extracts video information, thumbnails, and channel details from Bilibili, YouTube, and Vimeo, and sets them as tag properties.
repos.cordinGH/orca-dockpanel-plugin: Allows detaching a panel to create a 'floating window'-like experience.
repos.cordinGH/orca-tabsman-plugin: Adds a tab bar to the left sidebar.
repos.SaXz2/orca-tana-tag-color-plugin: Applies Tana-style colors and icons to blocks based on their first tag.
repos.sethyuan/orca-plugin-template: A basic plugin template for building Orca Note plugins (starter example).
repos.sethyuan/orca-plugin-official-themes: Official themes for Orca Note; provides installable theme styles.
repos.cordinGH/orca-tune-theme: A custom user theme for Orca Note.
